content: For More OBS Token Information: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/one-basis-cash/One Basis Share is a Decentralized platform based on Binance Ecochain BSC. At OBS you have ability to buy, sell and provide liquidity for One Basis Cash and One Basis Share on YFO. Some features of One Basis Share include:Decentralized platform based on Binance Ecochain BSC: The transaction speed is faster, the efficiency is higher, the handling fee is lower, and the operation cost is reduced.Stake to mine: Fair mining based on a block of 3 seconds. Time-saving, labor-saving, safe and convenient, a total of two years of mining time, 75% reduction every month.Binance Ecological Public Chain Upgrades DeFi's Algorithmic Stable Coin:Combining the experience of liquidity mining and flexible stablecoins, a set of relatively complete money market adjustment mechanism is formed, and its income model and product form are more abundant.High security + multi-ecological cooperation: In-depth cooperation with multiple projects in the ETH and BSC ecosystems, the team has many years of experience in the development of blockchain smart contracts and financial system development, fully guaranteeing the security of user assets.Partners Include: PancakeSwap, Binance, HotBit, BiKi, DigiFinez, Bibox, YFIONE, Catex, and CoinTiger.For More OBS Token Information: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/one-basis-cash/
